    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Izračunaj masno  središče</string>
            <string language="en">Calculate center of mass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Errechnen Sie Mitte der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calculez le centre de la masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calcule o centro da massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcoli il centro di massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογίστε το κέντρο της μάζας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calcule el centro de la masa</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Uravnoteži sistem štirih krogel ob premikanju ene same krogle.</string>
            <string language="en">Place the system of four balls in equilibrium with the movement of only one ball.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">težišče</string>
            <string language="en">center of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">statika</string>
            <string language="en">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Legen Sie das System von vier Kugeln in 
Gleichgewicht mit der Bewegung von nur einer Kugel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Placez le système de quatre boules dans 
l'équilibre avec le mouvement de seulement une boule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coloque o sistema de quatro esferas no equilíbrio
com o movimento de somente uma esfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Disponga il sistema di quattro sfere 
nell'equilibrio con il movimento di soltanto una sfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τοποθετήστε το σύστημα τεσσάρων σφαιρών στην 
ισορροπία με τη μετακίνηση μόνο μιας σφαίρας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ponga el sistema de cuatro bolas en equilibrio con
el movimiento de solamente una bola.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">centre de la masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">centro da massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">centro di massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κέντρο της μάζας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
